WorkItem.ClosedComment:
Hi,

I'm closing this work item, as it seems that this is not caused by an issue in Prism. In case you need further support about this, you could create a thread in the discussions section (http://compositewpf.codeplex.com/discussions).

Thanks,

Guido Leandro Maliandi
http://blogs.southworks.net/gmaliandi
WorkItem.Description: I have just down loaded the prism v2 for wpf 4 and silver light and the above error is reported
WorkItem.Summary: The referenced project '..\..\..\ChartControls\StockTraderRI.ChartControls.csproj does not exist. StockTraderRI.Modules.Market

Comments.Message:
Hi,

We've tried to reproduce the issue you're mentioning but we faced no exception when trying to run the StockTrader Reference Implementation in the Prism v2.2 version (May 2010 release, http://compositewpf.codeplex.com/releases/view/46046).

You could check if you have all the prerequisites, and if you're using the correct version for WPF 4.

I hope you find this helpful.

Guido Leandro Maliandi
http://blogs.southworks.net/gmaliandi
